alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 7:05PM MST until January 14 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, expect up to 9 inches above 10,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility overnight through Saturday as strong and gusty westerly winds persist. Additional snow expected after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
